level.text: A deed, in the form prescribed by the Deputy Chief Financial Officer, shall be filed within thirty (30) days of a transfer of an economic interest by the entity in which the transfer has occurred.
The form of deed to record transfers of economic interests and accompanying returns shall be available at the Office of Recorder of Deeds.
Deeds and accompanying returns evidencing transfers of economic interests shall be subject to rules for filing with the Recorder of Deeds as found in §§ 502 through 508 of this chapter.
